      • compare

        public DiscretePredictionStatistics compare(Predicate p)
        Compares the baseline with te inferred result for a given predicate DOES NOT check the baseline database for atoms. Only use this if all possible predicted atoms are active and unfiltered
        Specified by:
        compare in interface PredictionComparator

      • compare

        public DiscretePredictionStatistics compare(Predicate p,
                                   int maxBaseAtoms)
        Compares the baseline with the inferred result for a given predicate. Checks the baseline database for atoms
        Specified by:
        compare in interface PredictionComparator
        Parameters:
        Predicate - p : The predicate to compare
        int - maxAtoms : Defines the maximum number of base atoms that can be found for the given predicate. (This will vary, depending on the predicate and the problem.)
